title: gold 4 looking for partner
body: Looking for partner in gold for ranked duo. Preferably adc as I've been playing a lot of supp recently. HMU if interested, only requirement is that you don't flame / lose your cool during games and play till the end.

replies.body: I'm currently Silver 4 but I don't lose my cool ever and I am a pretty chill person in general... I usually don't surrender either so if you're okay with someone from a lower rank please add: Foxilite
